bordered.description: Whether to display outer borders and column borders
bordered.description_zh: 是否展示外边框和列边框

:columns.description: The following table describes the configuration of the table columns
:columns.description_zh: 表格列的配置描述，具体项见下表

:components.description_zh: 覆盖默认的 table 元素

:getPopupContainer.description: Set the rendering nodes for various types of floating layers in the table, such as the filter menu
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 设置表格内各类浮层的渲染节点，如筛选菜单

:locale.description: The default copywriting settings currently include sorting, filtering, and empty data copy
:locale.description_zh: 默认文案设置，目前包括排序、过滤、空数据文案

:pagination.description: Paginer, which is set to false does not show and pagination
:pagination.description_zh: 分页器，设为 false 时不展示和进行分页

:rowClassName.description: The class name of the table row

:rowKey.description: The value of the table row key can be a string or a function
:rowKey.description_zh: 表格行 key 的取值，可以是字符串或一个函数

:rowSelection.description: Whether table rows can be selected, [Config]
:rowSelection.description_zh: 表格行是否可选择，[配置项]

rowHoverable.description: Whether to enable hover interaction for table rows
rowHoverable.description_zh: 表格行是否开启 hover 交互

:scroll.description: Whether the table is scrollable or not, you can also specify the width and height of the scrolling area
:scroll.description_zh: 表格是否可滚动，也可以指定滚动区域的宽、高

:showSorterTooltip.description: Whether the header displays a tooltip hint for the next sort. When the parameter type is Object, it will be set as a property of the Tooltip
:showSorterTooltip.description_zh: 表头是否显示下一次排序的 tooltip 提示。当参数类型为对象时，将被设置为 Tooltip 的属性

:sortDirections.description: The supported sorting method can be 'ascend' descend
:sortDirections.description_zh: 支持的排序方式，取值为 `ascend` descend

:sticky.description: Set the sticky head and scrollbar
:sticky.type: boolean / {offsetHeader?: number, offsetScroll?: number, getContainer?: () => HTMLElement}
:sticky.description_zh: 设置粘性头部和滚动条

tableLayout.description: The [table-layout](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/table-layout) property of the table element, set to 'fixed' means that the content does not affect the layout of the column
tableLayout.default:
无
固定表头/列或使用了 `column.ellipsis` 时，默认值为 `fixed`
tableLayout.description_zh: 表格元素的 [table-layout](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/table-layout) 属性，设为 `fixed` 表示内容不会影响列的布局

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scroll to the target location (rowKey for Record when the key is set)
methods.params: (config: { index?: number, key?: React.Key, top?: number }) => void
methods.description_zh: 滚动到目标位置（设置 key 时为 Record 对应的 rowKey）

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when there are changes in pagination, sorting, and filtering
events.params: function(pagination, filters, sorter, extra: { currentDataSource: [], action: paginate / sort / filter })
events.description_zh: 分页、排序、筛选变化时触发

events.name: onScroll
events.description: Triggered when the form content scrolls (only vertical scrolling triggers the event under virtual scrolling)
events.description_zh: 表单内容滚动时触发（虚拟滚动下只有垂直滚动会触发事件）

pagination.name: position
pagination.description: Specify the position where the pagination is displayed
pagination.type: topLeft | topCenter | topRight | bottomLeft | bottomCenter | bottomRight[]

expandable.name: childrenColumnName
expandable.description: Specify the column name of the tree structure

expandable.name: defaultExpandAllRows
expandable.description: Initially, whether to expand all rows
expandable.description_zh: 初始时，是否展开所有行

expandable.name: expandRowByClick
expandable.description: Expand child row by clicking on the row
expandable.description_zh: 通过点击行来展开子行

expandable.name: fixed
expandable.description: Control whether the expand icon is fixed
expandable.description_zh: 控制展开图标是否固定

expandable.name: indentSize
expandable.description: Indent size in pixels of tree data
expandable.description_zh: 展示树形数据时，每层缩进的宽度，以 px 为单位

expandable.name: rowExpandable
expandable.description: Set whether row can be expandable

rowSelection.name: selectedRowKeys
rowSelection.description: Controlled selected row
rowSelection.description_zh: 指定选中项的 key 数组

rowSelection.name: columnWidth
rowSelection.description: Set the width of the selection column
rowSelection.description_zh: 自定义列表选择框宽度

rowSelection.name: selections
rowSelection.description: Custom selection configuration, only displays default selections when set to true
rowSelection.description_zh: 自定义选择配置项，设为 true 时显示默认选择项

rowSelection.name: checkStrictly
rowSelection.description: Checkable state is completely controlled in checkable state
rowSelection.description_zh: checkable 状态下节点选择完全受控

rowSelection.name: columnTitle
rowSelection.description: Custom column selection box title
rowSelection.description_zh: 自定义列表选择框标题

rowSelection.name: columnWidth
rowSelection.description: Set the width of the selection column
rowSelection.description_zh: 自定义列表选择框宽度

rowSelection.name: fixed
rowSelection.description: Fixed selection column on the left
rowSelection.description_zh: 把选择框列固定在左边

rowSelection.name: getCheckboxProps
rowSelection.description: Default attribute configuration of checkbox
rowSelection.description_zh: 选择框的默认属性配置

rowSelection.name: hideSelectAll
rowSelection.description: Hide the select-all checkbox and custom selection
rowSelection.description_zh: 隐藏全选勾选框与自定义选择项

rowSelection.name: preserveSelectedRowKeys
rowSelection.description: Keep selection keys even when data is deleted
rowSelection.description_zh: 当数据被删除时仍然保留选项的 key

rowSelection.name: renderCell
rowSelection.description: Render checkbox cell, same usage as Column render
rowSelection.description_zh: 渲染勾选框，用法与 Column 的 render 相同

rowSelection.name: selectedRowKeys
rowSelection.description: Specify selected row keys array
rowSelection.description_zh: 指定选中项的 key 数组，需要和 onChange 进行配合

rowSelection.name: defaultSelectedRowKeys
rowSelection.description: Default selected row keys
rowSelection.description_zh: 默认选中项的 key 数组

rowSelection.name: selections
rowSelection.description: Custom selection configurations
rowSelection.description_zh: 自定义选择项，设为 true 时使用默认选择项

rowSelection.name: type
rowSelection.description: Selection type
rowSelection.description_zh: 多选/单选

rowSelection.name: onCell
rowSelection.description: Set cell properties
rowSelection.description_zh: 设置单元格属性，用法与 Column 的 onCell 相同

rowSelection.name: onChange
rowSelection.description: Callback when selected rows change
rowSelection.description_zh: 选中项发生变化时的回调

rowSelection.name: onSelect
rowSelection.description: Callback when user manually | a row
rowSelection.description_zh: 用户手动选择/取消选择某行的回调

rowSelection.name: onSelectAll
rowSelection.description: Callback when user selects/deselects all rows
rowSelection.description_zh: 用户手动选择/取消选择所有行的回调

rowSelection.name: onSelectInvert
rowSelection.description: Callback when user inverts selection
rowSelection.description_zh: 用户手动选择反选的回调

rowSelection.name: onSelectNone
rowSelection.description: Callback when user clears all selections
rowSelection.description_zh: 用户清空选择的回调

rowSelection.name: onSelectMultiple
rowSelection.description: Callback when user uses keyboard shift for multiple selection
rowSelection.description_zh: 用户使用键盘 shift 选择多行的回调

scroll.name: x
scroll.description: Set horizontal scrolling, can also be used to specify the width of the scroll area
scroll.description_zh: 设置横向滚动，也可用于指定滚动区域的宽

scroll.name: y
scroll.description: Set vertical scrolling, can also be used to specify the height of the scroll area
scroll.description_zh: 设置纵向滚动，也可用于指定滚动区域的高

scroll.name: scrollToFirstRowOnChange
scroll.description: Whether to scroll to the top of the table when paging, sorting, filtering changes
scroll.description_zh: 是否在分页、排序、筛选变化后滚动到表格顶部

scroll.name: x
scroll.description: Set horizontal scrolling, can also specify width of scroll area as pixels, percentage, true or 'max-content'
scroll.description_zh: 设置横向滚动，也可用于指定滚动区域的宽，可以设置为像素值，百分比，true 和 'max-content'

scroll.name: y
scroll.description: Set vertical scrolling, can also specify height of scroll area
scroll.description_zh: 设置纵向滚动，也可用于指定滚动区域的高，可以设置为像素值

selection.name: key
selection.description_zh: React 需要的 key，建议设置
